body: @fpmchu, I apologize, I should have checked Thrust's documentation before sending you on a wild goose chase. But you are right, since we have committed to this in the documentation, it'll be nice to support repeated indices. My belief is, the performance may not be terrible if you turned the `+=` to `atomicAdd`. Do you mind giving it a shot and running the benchmarks?
